chk_different_registrations.name: chk_different_registrations
chk_different_registrations.value: "matches"."registration1_id" IS NULL OR "matches"."registration2_id" IS NULL OR "matches"."registration1_id" != "matches"."registration2_id"

chk_winner_valid.name: chk_winner_valid
chk_winner_valid.value: "matches"."played" = false OR "matches"."winner_id" IS NULL OR "matches"."winner_id" = "matches"."registration1_id" OR "matches"."winner_id" = "matches"."registration2_id"
